english_translation: From Zayd ibn Aslam, from Ibn Umar, from Abu Dhar, elevated it regarding the Duha prayer. Narrated from him is 'Abd al-Hamid ibn Ja'far. And Musa ibn Yaqub narrated from al-Salt ibn Salim, the freed slave of Talha, or the son of Uthman ibn Ubaidullah al-Tamimi, from a freed slave of Umar, from Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-As, from Abu al-Darda', from the Prophet ﷺ. Al-Salt said: Sulayman ibn Tha'labah al-Ansari informed me of it. And al-Sha'abi said: From Ibn Umar: The Duha prayer is an innovation, and what an innovation it is, and this is more correct. It is said: Husayn ibn Ata' ibn Yasir.

narrators.name: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Abd al-Muttalib ibn Hashim
